bcbioRNASeq
  • Reference

Differentially Expressed Gene Heatmap

This function is a simplified version of plotGeneHeatmap() that is optimized for handling a DESeqResults object rather a gene vector. All of the optional parameters for plotGeneHeatmap() are also available to this function.

plotDEGHeatmap(object, counts, ...)

# S4 method for DESeqResults,DESeqTransform
plotDEGHeatmap(object, counts,
  lfc = 0L)

# S4 method for DESeqResults,DESeqDataSet
plotDEGHeatmap(object, counts, lfc = 0L)

Arguments

object

Object.
counts

Secondary object containing normalized counts.
...

Additional arguments.
lfc

log2 fold change ratio cutoff.
alpha

Alpha level cutoff.
title

Plot title.

Value

Graphical output only.

See also

Other Heatmaps: plotCorrelationHeatmap

Examples

data(dds, res, rld)

# DESeqResults, DESeqTransform
plotDEGHeatmap(res, rld)

# DESeqResults, DESeqDataSet
plotDEGHeatmap(res, dds)
#> Warning: Using a DESeqTransform object for counts is recommended
